name: WangReal Engine Game Data Archive
summary: Learn about .NOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You will most likely only encounter an NOP file if you play White Day: A Labyrinth Named School and are looking to modify assets in the game. However, NOP files may be packaged with other games that use the WangReal Engine. NOP files can be found in the directory that the game is installed.

description: An NOP file is an archive used by White Day: A Labyrinth Named School, a Korean survival horror game. It contains data files for the game, which include animations, textures, meshes, and transitions. NOP files are compressed to reduce the amount of space taken up by game assets.
